<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/scalartax/entities/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint creates a new entity along with its associated address.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"entity":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the entity"},"guid":{"type":"string","description":"Globally unique identifier for the entity"},"tax_id":{"type":"string","description":"Tax identification number for the entity"},"phone":{"type":"string","description":"Phone number of the entity (nullable)"},"is_online_marketplace":{"type":"string","description":"Indicates if the entity operates as an online marketplace (e.g., Yes, No)"},"parent_entity_id":{"type":"string"},"registration_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Date of registration for the entity"},"tax_exemptions_type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of tax exemptions applicable to the entity"},"is_default":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if this is the default entity"},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created the product (nullable)"},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string","descripiton":"ID of the user who last updated the product (nullable)"}},"required":["name","guid","tax_id","guide","is_online_market","registration_date","tax_exemption_type","is_default"]},"address":{"type":"object","properties":{"location_code":{"type":"string","description":"Code representing the location"},"address_type_id":{"type":"string","description":"Identifier for the type of address (e.g., location)"},"line1":{"type":"string","description":"First line of the address"},"line2":{"type":"string","description":"Second line of the address (optional)"},"city":{"type":"string","description":"City of the address"},"region":{"type":"string","description":"State or region of the address"},"country":{"type":"string","description":"Country of the address"},"postal_code":{"type":"string","description":"Postal code of the address"},"start_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Date when the address becomes effective"},"created_by_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the user who created the product (nullable)"},"updated_by_id":{"type":"string or null","descripiton":"ID of the user who last updated the product (nullable)"}},"required":["location_code","address_type_id","line1","line2","city","region","country","postal_code","start_date"]}},"title":"Entity"}}},"description":"Entity object","required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
